name: MTLStencilDescriptor
desc: An object that defines the front-facing or back-facing stencil operations of a depth and stencil state object.

items.name: var stencilFailureOperation: MTLStencilOperation
items.desc: The operation that is performed to update the values in the stencil attachment when the stencil test fails.

items.name: var depthFailureOperation: MTLStencilOperation
items.desc: The operation that is performed to update the values in the stencil attachment when the stencil test passes, but the depth test fails.

items.name: var depthStencilPassOperation: MTLStencilOperation
items.desc: The operation that is performed to update the values in the stencil attachment when both the stencil test and the depth test pass.

items.name: var stencilCompareFunction: MTLCompareFunction
items.desc: The comparison that is performed between the masked reference value and a masked value in the stencil attachment.

items.name: var readMask: UInt32
items.desc: A bitmask that determines from which bits that stencil comparison tests can read.

items.name: var writeMask: UInt32
items.desc: A bitmask that determines to which bits that stencil operations can write.

items.name: enum MTLStencilOperation
items.desc: The operation performed on a currently stored stencil value when a comparison test passes or fails.
